Can anyone show me another way to raise my resolution to 1024 768?
scroll down and look for lines like this: Modes          "800x600" "640x480"
change all of them to: Modes          "1024x768"
save and close, then ctrl+alt+backspace to restart X
post your xorg.conf to ubuntu.pastebin.com please
replace the existing xorg.conf with that one (just copy and paste), then restart X
